reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This apartment was 85Euro per night and value for money, we loved it. It was large and spacious and clean. A little bit out of the centre, but close to the train station and an easy metro ride to anywere. All the amentities you could expect froma n apartment. This is not a hotel, so don't expect room service and your room to be made up daily, but if you are looking for somewere nice, a little cheaper than a hotel, and are willing to sacrifice the location (still good, but not close to town) and hotel services, then this is perfect.
reviews.title: Great Vallue for money

likes.disliked: — Would not recommend anyone to walk back at night from train station by themselves, a bit dodgy

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel's only a 6-minute walk from Brussels Midi station, perfect if you need to catch a train early but it's not exactly in the middle of things.
reviews.title: Good location

likes.disliked: — Flat pillows, beds could be more comfortable

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We opted for a room instead of an apartment and were given one on the ground floor. Understandably, we had to keep the curtains closed for our entire stay as our room looked out directly to the main street. The beds were adequate but not particularly comfortable, and we found that the pillows went flat very easily. Good points included the large toilet, generally clean room and free (albeit unstable) WiFi access. Price was also generally reasonable at 80 euros a night.
reviews.title: Great rate and convenient location

likes.liked: — Cleanliness and location and free wireless!
